alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 7:00PM EDT until June 08 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central Ohio... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 700 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pleasantville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Bremen, Pleasantville, Rushville, West Rushville and North Berne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central Ohio.
